General.Name: Yangaroo Inc
General.Description: YANGAROO Inc., a software company, provides workflow management solutions for the media and entertainment ecosystem industries in Canada and the United States. It operates and offers Digital Media Distribution System (DMDS) platform, a cloud-based technology that provides an integrated workflow and broadcaster connected managed network for digital content delivery and related data management in the advertising, music, and entertainment award show markets. The company was formerly known as Musicrypt.com Inc. and changed its name to YANGAROO Inc. in July 2007. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 67 Mowat Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M6K 3E3

4.Name: Mr. Garry  Wallace
4.Title: Exec. VP of Sales & Marketing and Member of The Advisory Board
